messages.alpha: This field may only contain alphabetic characters
messages.alpha_num: This field may only contain alpha-numeric characters
messages.alpha_dash: This field may contain alpha-numeric characters as well as dashes and underscores
messages.alpha_spaces: This field may only contain alphabetic characters as well as spaces
messages.between: This field must be between {min} and {max}
messages.confirmed: This field confirmation does not match
messages.digits: This field must be numeric and exactly contain {length} digits
messages.dimensions: This field must be {width} pixels by {height} pixels
messages.email: This field must be a valid email
messages.excluded: This field is not a valid value
messages.ext: This field is not a valid file
messages.image: This field must be an image
messages.integer: This field must be an integer
messages.max_value: This field must be {max} or less
messages.max: This field may not be greater than {length} characters
messages.mimes: This field must have a valid file type
messages.min_value: This field must be {min} or more
messages.min: This field must be at least {length} characters
messages.numeric: This field may only contain numeric characters
messages.oneOf: This field is not a valid value
messages.size: This field size must be less than {size}KB
messages.double: This field must be a valid decimal
